title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Hangzhou, China
description:
As person who loves programming, have you ever regretted not crafting your source code into beautiful one, due to the pressure of schedule? Or have you had trouble to find right person for a deep discussion on programming issues?  We can help you to remove these troublesome. ? 
In Coderetreat Event, you’ll have an environment without the pressure of schedule, spend one day coding for fun, craft your source code, and try different engineering practices. Meanwhile, you can discuss with people around you who have common interests.
